meanings.sent1: I love to eat praties with my dinner.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes delicious mashed praties.
meanings.sent3: Why did the praties go to the party? Because they heard it was a 'mash'!
meanings.sent4: The field of praties stretched out like a golden carpet.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked praties filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent2: The market vendor shouted, 'Fresh praties for sale!'
meanings.sent3: Why did the praties wear sunglasses? To avoid getting 'mashed'!
meanings.sent4: The bag of praties was a treasure trove for the hungry family.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled at the word 'praties' and its funny sound.

meanings.definition: a type of food made from potatoes
meanings.sent1: She served a steaming bowl of praties for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's specialty was crispy fried praties.
meanings.sent3: Why did the praties break up with the corn? They couldn't 'mash' well together!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling praties wafted through the air.
meanings.sent5: The golden brown color of the praties was irresistible.
